import { useState } from 'react'; import Link from "next/link"; import style from '../styles/Navbar.module.scss'; const Navbar = (props) => { const [megaMenu, setMegaMenu] = useState(false); const [mobileMenu, setMobileMenu] = useState(false); const handleMegaMenu = () => { let isOpen = !megaMenu; setMegaMenu(isOpen); } const handleMobileMenu = () => { let isMobileOpen = !mobileMenu; setMobileMenu(isMobileOpen); } return ( <>
